statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: In many applications very large integers numbers are required. Some of these applications are using keys for secure transmission of data, encryption, etc. In this problem you are given a number, you have to determine the number of digits in the factorial of the number.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: Input consists of several lines of integer numbers. The first line contains an integer n, which is the number of cases to be tested, followed by n lines, one integer 1 �� n �� 107 on each line.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: The output contains the number of digits in the factorial of the integers appearing in the input.
